name: SkyLink
headline: Travel Management Meets AI
description:
SkyLink is transforming corporate travel into a hassle-free, efficient experience. By integrating advanced route optimization and reducing the need for traditional travel agents, we're not only saving companies millions but also simplifying the travel process. 

With SkyLink, employees can effortlessly book their travel, just like sending a Slack message. Trusted by leading global corporations, our platform acts as a pocket-sized travel agent, ensuring smart, cost-effective travel decisions and a smoother journey for everyone involved. 

SkyLink is where simplicity meets innovation in corporate travel.

founders.name: Atyab Bhatti, Founder
founders.description: Atyab is the co-founder of SkyLink

founders.name: Kush Maheshwari, Founder
founders.description: Kush Maheshwari is the co-founder of SkyLink

generated_description:
SkyLink is shaking up corporate travel with a smart blend of artificial intelligence and streamlined processes. Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W22, SkyLink has quickly positioned itself as an innovative travel management solution based in New York. With a compact team of 12 passionate employees, the company is dedicated to making corporate travel more efficient.

Their central tagline, "Travel Management Meets AI," encapsulates their mission. SkyLink replaces the need for traditional travel agents, allowing employees to book their travel as effortlessly as sending a message in Slack. The platform serves as a digital travel assistant, seamlessly optimizing routes and costs while adhering to company policies. Ultimately, this helps firms save millions while ensuring a smoother travel experience for their employees.

What sets SkyLink apart is its user-friendly interface that integrates directly into existing systems like Microsoft Teams and Slack. Travelers can manage bookings with a chat, getting instant access to personalized travel options that align with their preferences. The platform not only suggests cost-effective choices but also automates various workflows to cut down the time spent on travel planning and coordination.

SkyLink is built on the principles of security and privacy, boasting certifications like SOC2 I and II. Founders Atyab Bhatti and Kush Maheshwari, both Y Combinator alumni, lead a team backed by notable industry veterans who understand the nuances of corporate travel.

In a nutshell, SkyLink combines simplicity and innovation to create a futuristic travel experience that's not just efficient but also friendly. It's where corporate travel gets modernized, ensuring businesses can focus on what they do best while their travel is handled effortlessly. 

Check them out at [tryskylink.com](http://www.tryskylink.com).
